name: Galaxy Monkey
description: Galaxy Monkey is out there all alone, fighting the evil gorillas, shoot down their cookies with your banana gun. Catch the juices in space for a boost. Work-in-progress: double-spread banana gun, triple-spread banana gun, reinforcement monkeys, special monkey ships, more progress in optimization and run-time. Seeking to make it like the 2-D shooter minigame in Ape Escape classic but with more action. Will port it to a game engine but unsure which one yet, still doing research.
